TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MemberDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示類別成員，例如屬性或事件。

span.span: Represents a class member, such as a property or event.

summary.span: 這是個抽象基底類別。

span.span: This is an abstract base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是基底類別而類別。 is the base class for the and the classes. 類別提供事件的描述和類別提供屬性的描述。The class provides a description of an event, and the class provides a description of a property. 這個類別會定義屬性和方法來存取其預存的屬性。This class defines properties and methods to access its stored attributes. 屬性取得的屬性集合。The property gets the collection of attributes. ， ， ，和屬性會擷取這些特定的屬性的值。The , , , and properties retrieve the values of those specific attributes. 和屬性提供成員的名稱。The and properties provide the name of the member. 也會定義方法來比較這到另一個。The also defines an method to compare this to another. > [!NOTE] > 一般而言，當您繼承自和類別，而不是從這個類別。Typically, you inherit from the and classes, and not from this class. ## Examples 因為這個類別的用法大多會落在繼承的類別和，請參閱這些類別中的範例。Since most of the usage of this class will fall on the inherited classes and , refer to the examples in these classes.

span.span: An that lists the attributes in the parent class.
Initially, this is empty.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，將繼承類別的屬性加入父類別中屬性的指定清單。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds the attributes of the inheriting class to the specified list of attributes in the parent class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對重複的屬性，會保留最後一個新增至清單。For duplicate attributes, the last one added to the list is kept. 的屬性會建立一次。The with the attributes is created once. 如果在清單中有重複的屬性，則會儲存第一個執行個體;所有後續的重複屬性會從清單中移除。If there are duplicate attributes in the list, only the first instance is saved; all subsequent duplicate attributes are removed from the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般來說，傳回的值將會與相同`instance`參數。Normally, the return value will be the same as the `instance` parameter. 如果另一個物件已經與此執行個體，或執行個體是自訂類型描述元方法可能會傳回不同的值。If another object has been associated with this instance, or if the instance is a custom type descriptor, the method may return a different value.
